title: Multiplication
desc:
Post 1102
- Combine 2 cards together, Multiply the post number of the first one using any number in the second card, you will get the card from the result number.
- If it would go above the top card before the post divider, remove the top card's post number from the result until it is a card before it.
- The host may nerf the card you make if it would be rule 10d/17d normally.
